snippet.title: Tallowmere - now on Steam! [Gameplay, developer commentary]
snippet.description:
Tallowmere is now available on Steam for Windows/Mac/Linux:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/340520/

"Indulge Lady Tallowmere and see how far through her lovingly violent dungeons you can delve in this 2D indie action roguelike-inspired platformer. New rooms are procedurally generated every time you play. How far can you make it?"

Tallowmere is my debut game, having been in development for over a year, and I am very excited to have this launch on Steam today! This video is a quick celebratory look, showing off some gameplay with commentary about base mechanics and how the game works.

If you'd like to play, please click the link above to purchase the game, and discover for yourself all that lies within the depths of Tallowmere's dungeons. Best of luck to you, hero.
